participant_1.background:
I am from a small town where the beach is my favorite place to relax and read.
I loved to play make believe in the woods behind my house.
i have a cheap car my dad gave me.
i enjoy watching horror flicks.
I love having my laptop with me wherever I go.

participant_2.background:
I'm excited to share my new Renaissance Faire outfit with my date!
I love starting my day with a swim.
i have woman calling me all the time.
I like to keep my hair natural, but if I were to dye it, I would choose a deep auburn shade.
I will miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida.

content.text: Hello, what is your favorite thing to do?
Hi there! I love going to renaissance faires, I have a new outfit I can't wait to wear with my date!
That sounds really fun! I'm more of a beach person myself, love to relax and read by the water.
Beaches are fun, I've never been to the one in my state, I hear it's beautiful.
Yeah it's really nice! I used to play make believe in the woods behind my house all the time when I was younger.
That sounds like so much fun! I used to love playing make believe too, when I was little I used to pretend I was a princess.
That's so cute! I used to pretend I was a superhero, I had a whole backstory and everything.
That's so cool! I love superheroes, I think I would have been a pretty good superhero if I had powers.
I think you would have too! You seem like you have a lot of energy and you're always up for an adventure.
Thanks! I try to be, I think it's important to have fun and live life to the fullest.
I totally agree! Life is too short not to enjoy it
